description:
Little helpful thing for Pathfinder 1e. Experimental and very opinionated in nature.
Main features:
  • Enhanced roll details, display natural rolls and total bonus along with total result.
  • Attack rolls are enhanced in detail and look more like other rolls.
  • Common roll DCs or their baselines
  • Small notes for most checks for quick reference.
  • Compressed main character sheet
  • Additional details in character sheet, such as natural reach, overuse of item slots, unused item slots,...
  • Compressed sidebar listings
  • Damage type icons
  • Helpful warnings about unlinked tokens, under or overused skill points, feats, etc.
  • Attack card button redesign and relabel
  • Spells known and base DC per level
  • Charge configuration origin statement
  • Formula display in inline rolls
  • ID header button for all sheets
  • Helpful warnigns about scene setup omissions for GMs.
  • and more! probably

Note: Feature set is slightly different for older versions of Foundry and PF1.
